attributes.action: To understand we will vote all of you out if you continue to ignore the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the public, are sick of being ignored, you do not listen to us and press on with unpopular, unfair, regressive taxation. Road pricing is just one of many proposals which you have been told we do not want, if you fail to listen then we have the right to vote all of you out, and we will do so at the first opportunity, the first 2 million have already made that clear.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/StopCharging/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
